update-checker.running-latest: <white>You are running the latest version of <plugin_name>!
update-checker.update-found-console:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
    <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
    <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>
update-checker.update-found-player:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
  <dark_gray>• <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
  <dark_gray>• <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>

translation.help:
<white>Translations subcommands:
  <dark_gray>• <white>reload: <gray><i>Reloads the translation files.
  <dark_gray>• <white>test <node>: <gray><i>Test a translation.

test.illegal: <red>Translation node "<u><node></u>" cannot begin or end with a period!

dump.dumping: <green>Gathering dump information and uploading to mclo.gs...

status-screen.mercenary: <hover:show_text:'<white>This town may participate in wars for money.'><grey>[<green>Mercenary<grey>]</hover>

global.forced: <prefix>The town of <town> has been sacked and placed under occupation by the armies of <attacker>!

global.surrender: <prefix>The siege at <town> has been abandoned by the attackers.
global.forced: <prefix>The siege of <town> has been lifted by the defenders!

draw.global: <prefix>The siege of <town> has ended in a draw!
draw.title: <yellow><u><b>Draw
draw.subtitle: <gray><i>The siege at <town> has ended!

building.destroy: <red>You can not break blocks at towns under siege. You are <distance>/<range> block(s) from the siege.
building.place: <red>You can not place blocks at towns under siege. You are <distance>/<range> block(s) from the siege.

placement.inside-claim: <red>Rallies cannot be placed inside of towns or outposts!
placement.bounding-box: <red>A rally must have a clear 3x2x3 spawning area around it!
placement.min-range-town-friendly: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a friendly town!
placement.min-range-outpost-friendly: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a friendly outpost!
placement.min-range-rally-friendly: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a friendly rally!
placement.min-range-town-hostile: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a hostile town!
placement.min-range-outpost-hostile: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a hostile outpost!
placement.min-range-rally-hostile: <red>A rally must be further than <range> blocks away from a friendly rally!
placement.success-others: <green>A rally point named <name> has been created by <creator>!

spawn-menu.title: Choose a Spawn
info-lore: <!i><gray>Select your spawn point. You can only choose spawns available to you.
<!i><gray>Spawn points can be disabled by hostile players if they get too close,
